tva:BasicDescription.tva:Title: Barcelona VS Real Madrid 3-2 Super Cup All Goals and Match highlights [23/8/2012]
tva:BasicDescription.tva:Synopsis: The Spanish Super Cup remains delicately poised after Barcelona secured a 3-2 win against Real Madrid in a pulsating first leg. 17 August: Spanish Super Cup, second leg - Barcelona 3-2 Real Madrid 10 December: La Liga - Real Madrid 1-3 Barcelona 18 January: Spanish Cup, quarter-final, first leg - Real Madrid 1-2 Barcelona 25 January: Spanish Cup, quarter-final, second leg - Barcelona 2-2 Real Madrid 21 April: La Liga - Barcelona 1-2 Real Madrid Lionel Messi scored a penalty after Andres Iniesta was fouled, before Xavi slotted home a sublime third. Which team does you like, Barcelona or Real Madrid? If you like Barcelona ,just buy a Barcelona Home new Shirt here goo.gl or you like Real Madrid, buy Real Madrid Home Soccer Jersey here goo.gl

tva:Genre.tva:Name: Non-linear audio-video
tva:Genre.tva:Definition: Services where the interaction is based mostly around choosing alternate audio or video files - VOD and AOD, maybe combined with 2.1.1.15 (multi stream)

tva:HowRelated.tva:Name: Recommendation
tva:HowRelated.tva:Definition: The reference points to a resource recommended the provider of the current resource. The service provider considers there to be similarities between the currently described resource and the referenced resource. Example: This could provide access to previous or next episodes or to all episodes (the parent series as a whole). Suggestion to record a programme which the broadcaster recommends because of what the user is watching.It could also point to a Web site proposing related programmes ‘recommended’ by the service provider. A recommendation can be used to suggest content or services or services bundles with a similar subject.

tva:Review.tva:FreeTextReview: Valdes he still thought of himself as﻿ Messi
valdes suck my cock﻿
valdes might be young but casillas is the BEST﻿
Valdez cost Barcelona﻿ the cup...whack!
True.. I'm not a fan﻿ of either team but messi wouldnt even make it in the epl (best league in the world) he is good but he will only shine as long as he status in la liga (not so good league).
barca need a world class keeper valdes kind of lost it for﻿ them
Every Goalkeeper messes up once﻿ in a while.
Hala Madrid!!!!﻿
because he is the bomb!﻿
I AM FAN BARCELONA but it﻿ is true:(
oh﻿ valdes...
@nimitzm Dude just shut up cause﻿ everybody dives ok not just barca or madrid every team does !
Should have been 2-2 if u ask me pause at 2:30 he﻿ is slightly offside
thats such a retarded way to think,﻿ pele only played in 1 league so hes worse than christano ronaldo.
Stays*﻿
Iniesta <3﻿
He's scored against man utd in two champions league finals and each year he did man utd were﻿ bpl champions

as a Barcelona fan, i've got to say congrats, you've got the better of the major﻿ disadvantages barca had the second leg and you guys deserve the cup. but at least be more mature about our players man, don't be talking shit because barca still played wonderfully.
@smellyfish36 that doesnt﻿ mean he's bad that just means he's underated unlike C. Ronaldo who is way to over rated.
Suck my dick﻿ barcelona
no fucker....pedro goal was offside face the﻿ fact madrid won....and don't come﻿ up with any excuses
@tzooh But then why did﻿ madrid win ?
thumbs up﻿ for 3:52

Bollocks ask any fan of the pl who is not a manc and they will tell you Messi is the best in the world, Ronaldo is second, im not being biased either im a chelsea fan, i love real because of mourinho and i hate barca for all their cheating in 2009 but you cannot deny﻿ messi is younger and hasnt peaked in his career, Ronaldo is at his peak now and still chasing messi's records
